transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hanji boliye.
Customer: Hello good morning sir.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Sir Shahdab
Executive: IndiaMART account manager Sahil se baat ho rahi hai na sir?
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Sir yaha pe hamare kuch documents pending the abhi KYC ke liye.
Executive: KYC.
Customer: Sir IndiaMART pe jo humne subscription liya tha na sir KYC ke liye kuch documents pending the. Jaise GST certificate ho gaya, Aadhar ho gaya, company PAN ho gaya.
Customer: Electricity service
Customer: Bill ho gaya, rent agreement aur cancel check.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ye cheeze sir humne upload ki nahi hai yaha pe.
Customer: To inko sir aapko ji sir?
Executive: Boliye boliye aap boliye.
Customer: Inko sir aap share kar dete WhatsApp me mere.
Executive: WhatsApp pe share kiya na bhaiya maine woh.
Customer: Ji sir?
Executive: Mai aapko call call lagata hu thodi der me.
Customer: Thik hai sir aap fresh ho jaiye fir call kijiye.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs help with pending KYC documents.

Resolution:

- Executive confirmed documents were already shared on WhatsApp.

Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer later.

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- kyc, documents, subscription, whatsapp
